Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The application supports importing directories filled with captioned images.
Importing can be accessed from the File menu.
Any errors encountered during the import process are shown in the dialog.

Subsection.title: Directory Layout
Subsection.Paragraph: The import process will recursively walk through a given directory hierarchy searching for image files. When an image file is discovered, the process will look for a caption file associated with the image. A caption file must have the file extension caption. For example, if the process discovers an image file named example.png, the caption file associated with it must be called example.caption.
Caption files must be provided in the documented caption file format.
